info.task: navigate to the first breadcrumb link
info.title: Navigate to the first breadcrumb link in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeFirstBreadcrumbLink
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Role of the landmark region, 'navigation', is conveyed
Role of the breadcrumbs container, 'list', is conveyed
Number of list items, 4, is conveyed
